requirements: Write a Python script that prints "Hello, Agentic Code Studio!

iterations.generated_code:
// FILE: HelloWorld.java

/**
 * A simple Java program that prints a greeting message to the console.
 * This class serves as a basic example of a complete, executable Java application.
 */
public class HelloWorld {

    /**
     * The main entry point for the application.
     * When the program is run, this method is executed.
     *
     * @param args Command line arguments (not used in this application).
     */
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        // Use System.out.println to print the specified string to the standard output stream.
        // The message is "Hello, Agentic Code Studio!".
        System.out.println("Hello, Agentic Code Studio!");
    }
}

/*
 * =============================================================================
 * --- How to Compile and Run this Code ---
 *
 * 1. Save the code:
 *    Save the code above into a file named `HelloWorld.java`.
 *
 * 2. Open a terminal or command prompt:
 *    Navigate to the directory where you saved the `HelloWorld.java` file.
 *
 * 3. Compile the code:
 *    You need a Java Development Kit (JDK) installed. Run the following command:
 *    javac HelloWorld.java
 *    This will create a `HelloWorld.class` file in the same directory.
 *
 * 4. Run the compiled code:
 *    Execute the program using the following command:
 *    java HelloWorld
 *
 * 5. Expected Output:
 *    The program will print the following message to the console:
 *    Hello, Agentic Code Studio!
 *
 * =============================================================================
 */
